title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1262.54 - Maximum cargo volume
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1262.54 - Maximum cargo volume

State Regulations

No cargo tank compartment shall be completely filled. There shall be sufficient space remaining to allow for expansion of the
contents to prevent distortion or leakage, and in no case shall the free space
be less than two percent of the capacity of the tank. Each tank compartment
shall be fitted with a sealed gauge marker set to indicate the maximum
permissible capacity. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21

1262.54

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
